15  // max size calculated to prevent overflows in internal comparisons
16  static const size_t MAX_BUFFER_SIZE = std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max() / 8 - 4;
17 
18  typedef BitStreamReader::BitPosType BitPosType;
19  typedef BitStreamReader::ReaderContext ReaderContext;
20 
21 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
22  typedef uint64_t BaseType;
23  typedef int64_t BaseSignedType;
24 #else
25  typedef uint32_t BaseType;
26  typedef int32_t BaseSignedType;
27 #endif

29  inline BaseType& getCacheBuffer(ReaderContext::BitCache& cache)
30  {
31 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
32  return cache.buffer64;
33 #else
34  return cache.buffer32;
35 #endif
36  }
37 
38  static const BaseType MASK_TABLE[] =
39  {
40 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
41  UINT64_C(0x00),
42  UINT64_C(0x0001), UINT64_C(0x0003), UINT64_C(0x0007), UINT64_C(0x000f),
43  UINT64_C(0x001f), UINT64_C(0x003f), UINT64_C(0x007f), UINT64_C(0x00ff),
44  UINT64_C(0x01ff), UINT64_C(0x03ff), UINT64_C(0x07ff), UINT64_C(0x0fff),
45  UINT64_C(0x1fff), UINT64_C(0x3fff), UINT64_C(0x7fff), UINT64_C(0xffff),
46  UINT64_C(0x0001ffff), UINT64_C(0x0003ffff), UINT64_C(0x0007ffff), UINT64_C(0x000fffff),
47  UINT64_C(0x001fffff), UINT64_C(0x003fffff), UINT64_C(0x007fffff), UINT64_C(0x00ffffff),
48  UINT64_C(0x01ffffff), UINT64_C(0x03ffffff), UINT64_C(0x07ffffff), UINT64_C(0x0fffffff),
49  UINT64_C(0x1fffffff), UINT64_C(0x3fffffff), UINT64_C(0x7fffffff), UINT64_C(0xffffffff),
50 
51  UINT64_C(0x00000001ffffffff), UINT64_C(0x00000003ffffffff),
52  UINT64_C(0x00000007ffffffff), UINT64_C(0x0000000fffffffff),
53  UINT64_C(0x0000001fffffffff), UINT64_C(0x0000003fffffffff),
54  UINT64_C(0x0000007fffffffff), UINT64_C(0x000000ffffffffff),
55  UINT64_C(0x000001ffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x000003ffffffffff),
56  UINT64_C(0x000007ffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x00000fffffffffff),
57  UINT64_C(0x00001fffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x00003fffffffffff),
58  UINT64_C(0x00007fffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x0000ffffffffffff),
59  UINT64_C(0x0001ffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x0003ffffffffffff),
60  UINT64_C(0x0007ffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x000fffffffffffff),
61  UINT64_C(0x001fffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x003fffffffffffff),
62  UINT64_C(0x007fffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x00ffffffffffffff),
63  UINT64_C(0x01ffffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x03ffffffffffffff),
64  UINT64_C(0x07ffffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x0fffffffffffffff),
65  UINT64_C(0x1fffffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0x3fffffffffffffff),
66  UINT64_C(0x7fffffffffffffff), UINT64_C(0xffffffffffffffff)
67 #else
68  UINT32_C(0x00),
69  UINT32_C(0x0001), UINT32_C(0x0003), UINT32_C(0x0007), UINT32_C(0x000f),
70  UINT32_C(0x001f), UINT32_C(0x003f), UINT32_C(0x007f), UINT32_C(0x00ff),
71  UINT32_C(0x01ff), UINT32_C(0x03ff), UINT32_C(0x07ff), UINT32_C(0x0fff),
72  UINT32_C(0x1fff), UINT32_C(0x3fff), UINT32_C(0x7fff), UINT32_C(0xffff),
73  UINT32_C(0x0001ffff), UINT32_C(0x0003ffff), UINT32_C(0x0007ffff), UINT32_C(0x000fffff),
74  UINT32_C(0x001fffff), UINT32_C(0x003fffff), UINT32_C(0x007fffff), UINT32_C(0x00ffffff),
75  UINT32_C(0x01ffffff), UINT32_C(0x03ffffff), UINT32_C(0x07ffffff), UINT32_C(0x0fffffff),
76  UINT32_C(0x1fffffff), UINT32_C(0x3fffffff), UINT32_C(0x7fffffff), UINT32_C(0xffffffff)
77 #endif
78  };
79 
80  static const uint8_t VARINT_SIGN_1 = UINT8_C(0x80);
81  static const uint8_t VARINT_BYTE_1 = UINT8_C(0x3f);
82  static const uint8_t VARINT_BYTE_N = UINT8_C(0x7f);
83  static const uint8_t VARINT_HAS_NEXT_1 = UINT8_C(0x40);
84  static const uint8_t VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N = UINT8_C(0x80);
85 
86  static const uint8_t VARUINT_BYTE = UINT8_C(0x7f);
87  static const uint8_t VARUINT_HAS_NEXT = UINT8_C(0x80);
88 
89  static const uint32_t VARSIZE_MAX_VALUE = (UINT32_C(1) << 31) - 1;
90 
91 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
92  inline BaseType parse64(const uint8_t* buffer)
93  {
94  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 56 |
95  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]) << 48 |
96  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[2]) << 40 |
97  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[3]) << 32 |
98  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[4]) << 24 |
99  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[5]) << 16 |
100  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[6]) << 8 |
101  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[7]);
102  }
103 
104  inline BaseType parse56(const uint8_t* buffer)
105  {
106  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 48 |
107  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]) << 40 |
108  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[2]) << 32 |
109  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[3]) << 24 |
110  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[4]) << 16 |
111  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[5]) << 8 |
112  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[6]);
113  }
114 
115  inline BaseType parse48(const uint8_t* buffer)
116  {
117  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 40 |
118  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]) << 32 |
119  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[2]) << 24 |
120  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[3]) << 16 |
121  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[4]) << 8 |
122  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[5]);
123  }
124 
125  inline BaseType parse40(const uint8_t* buffer)
126  {
127  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 32 |
128  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]) << 24 |
129  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[2]) << 16 |
130  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[3]) << 8 |
131  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[4]);
132  }
133 #endif
134  inline BaseType parse32(const uint8_t* buffer)
135  {
136  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 24 |
137  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]) << 16 |
138  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[2]) << 8 |
139  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[3]);
140  }
141 
142  inline BaseType parse24(const uint8_t* buffer)
143  {
144  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 16 |
145  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]) << 8 |
146  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[2]);
147  }
148 
149  inline BaseType parse16(const uint8_t* buffer)
150  {
151  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]) << 8 |
152  static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[1]);
153  }
154 
155  inline BaseType parse8(const uint8_t* buffer)
156  {
157  return static_cast<BaseType>(buffer[0]);
158  }
159 
161  inline void checkEof(const ReaderContext& ctx, uint8_t numBits)
162  {
163  if (ctx.bitIndex + numBits > ctx.bufferBitSize)
164  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: Reached eof(), reading from stream failed.");
165  }
166 
168  inline void checkNumBits(uint8_t numBits)
169  {
170  if (numBits > 32)
171  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: ReadBits #" + convertToString(numBits) +
172  " is not valid, reading from stream failed.");
173  }
174 
176  inline void checkNumBits64(uint8_t numBits)
177  {
178  if (numBits > 64)
179  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: ReadBits64 #" + convertToString(numBits) +
180  " is not valid, reading from stream failed.");
181  }
182 
184  inline void loadCacheNext(ReaderContext& ctx, uint8_t numBits)
185  {
186  static const uint8_t cacheBitSize = sizeof(BaseType) * 8;
187  BaseType& cacheBuffer = getCacheBuffer(ctx.cache);
188 
189  // ctx.bitIndex is always byte aligned and ctx.cacheNumBits is always zero in this call
190  const size_t byteIndex = ctx.bitIndex >> 3;
191  if (ctx.bufferBitSize >= ctx.bitIndex + cacheBitSize)
192  {
193  cacheBuffer =
194 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
195  parse64(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
196 #else
197  parse32(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
198 #endif
199  ctx.cacheNumBits = cacheBitSize;
200  }
201  else
202  {
203  checkEof(ctx, numBits);
204 
205  ctx.cacheNumBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(ctx.bufferBitSize - ctx.bitIndex);
206 
207  // buffer must be always available in full bytes, even if some last bits are not used
208  const uint8_t alignedNumBits = (ctx.cacheNumBits + 7) & ~0x7;
209 
210  switch (alignedNumBits)
211  {
212 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
213  case 64:
214  cacheBuffer = parse64(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
215  break;
216  case 56:
217  cacheBuffer = parse56(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
218  break;
219  case 48:
220  cacheBuffer = parse48(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
221  break;
222  case 40:
223  cacheBuffer = parse40(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
224  break;
225 #endif
226  case 32:
227  cacheBuffer = parse32(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
228  break;
229  case 24:
230  cacheBuffer = parse24(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
231  break;
232  case 16:
233  cacheBuffer = parse16(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
234  break;
235  default: // 8
236  cacheBuffer = parse8(ctx.buffer + byteIndex);
237  break;
238  }
239 
240  cacheBuffer >>= alignedNumBits - ctx.cacheNumBits;
241  }
242  }
243 
245  inline BaseType readBitsImpl(ReaderContext& ctx, uint8_t numBits)
246  {
247  BaseType value = 0;
248  const BaseType& cacheBuffer = getCacheBuffer(ctx.cache);
249 
250  if (ctx.cacheNumBits < numBits)
251  {
252  // read all remaining cache bits
253  value = cacheBuffer & MASK_TABLE[ctx.cacheNumBits];
254  ctx.bitIndex += ctx.cacheNumBits;
255  numBits -= ctx.cacheNumBits;
256 
257  // load next piece of buffer into cache
258  loadCacheNext(ctx, numBits);
259 
260  // add the remaining bits to the result
261  // if numBits is sizeof(BaseType) * 8 here, value is already 0 (see MASK_TABLE[0])
262  if (numBits < sizeof(BaseType) * 8)
263  value <<= numBits;
264  }
265  value |= ((cacheBuffer >> (ctx.cacheNumBits - numBits)) & MASK_TABLE[numBits]);
266  ctx.cacheNumBits -= numBits;
267  ctx.bitIndex += numBits;
268 
269  return value;
270  }
271 
273  inline BaseSignedType readSignedBitsImpl(ReaderContext& ctx, uint8_t numBits)
274  {
275  static const uint8_t typeSize = sizeof(BaseSignedType) * 8;
276  BaseType value = readBitsImpl(ctx, numBits);
277 
278  // Skip the signed overflow correction if numBits == typeSize.
279  // In that case, the value that comes out the readBits function
280  // is already correct.
281  if (numBits != 0 && numBits < typeSize && (value >= (static_cast<BaseType>(1) << (numBits - 1))))
282  value -= static_cast<BaseType>(1) << numBits;
283 
284  return static_cast<BaseSignedType>(value);
285  }
286 
287 #ifndef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
288 
289  inline uint64_t readBits64Impl(ReaderContext& ctx, uint8_t numBits)
290  {
291  // read the first 32 bits
292  numBits -= 32;
293  uint64_t value = readBitsImpl(ctx, 32);
294 
295  // add the remaining bits
296  value <<= numBits;
297  value |= readBitsImpl(ctx, numBits);
298 
299  return value;
300  }
301 #endif
302 } // namespace
303 
304 BitStreamReader::ReaderContext::ReaderContext(const uint8_t* buffer, size_t bufferBitSize)
305 : buffer(const_cast<uint8_t*>(buffer)),
306  bufferBitSize(bufferBitSize),
307  hasInternalBuffer(false),
308  cacheNumBits(0),
309  bitIndex(0)
310 {
311  Init();
312 
313  const size_t bufferByteSize = (bufferBitSize + 7) / 8;
314  if (bufferByteSize > MAX_BUFFER_SIZE)
315  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: Buffer size exceeded limit '" +
316  convertToString(MAX_BUFFER_SIZE) + "' bytes!");
317 }
318 
319 BitStreamReader::ReaderContext::ReaderContext(const std::string& filename)
320 : hasInternalBuffer(true),
321  cacheNumBits(0),
322  bitIndex(0)
323 {
324  Init();
325 
326  std::ifstream is(filename.c_str(), std::ifstream::binary);
327  if (!is)
328  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: Cannot open '" + filename + "' for reading!");
329 
330  is.seekg(0, is.end);
331  const std::streampos fileSize = is.tellg();
332  is.seekg(0);
333 
334  if (static_cast<uint64_t>(fileSize) > MAX_BUFFER_SIZE)
335  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: File size exceeded limit of '" +
336  convertToString(MAX_BUFFER_SIZE) + "' bytes!");
337 
338  const size_t bufferByteSize = static_cast<size_t>(fileSize);
339  buffer = new uint8_t[bufferByteSize];
340  bufferBitSize = bufferByteSize * 8;
341  is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&buffer[0]), bufferByteSize);
342  if (!is)
343  {
344  delete[] buffer;
345  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: Failed to read '" + filename + "'!");
346  }
347 }
348 
349 BitStreamReader::ReaderContext::~ReaderContext()
350 {
351  if (hasInternalBuffer)
352  delete[] buffer;
353 }
354 
355 void BitStreamReader::ReaderContext::Init()
356 {
357 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
358  cache.buffer64 = 0;
359 #else
360  cache.buffer32 = 0;
361 #endif
362 }
363 
364 BitStreamReader::BitStreamReader(const uint8_t* buffer, size_t bufferByteSize) :
365  m_context(buffer, bufferByteSize * 8)
366 {}

368 BitStreamReader::BitStreamReader(const BitBuffer& bitBuffer) :
369  m_context(bitBuffer.getBuffer(), bitBuffer.getBitSize())
370 {}
371 
372 BitStreamReader::BitStreamReader(const std::string& filename) : m_context(filename)
373 {}
374 
375 BitStreamReader::~BitStreamReader()
376 {}
377 
378 uint32_t BitStreamReader::readBits(uint8_t numBits)
379 {
380  checkNumBits(numBits);
381 
382  return static_cast<uint32_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, numBits));
383 }
384 
385 uint64_t BitStreamReader::readBits64(uint8_t numBits)
386 {
387  checkNumBits64(numBits);
388 
389 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
390  return readBitsImpl(m_context, numBits);
391 #else
392  if (numBits <= 32)
393  return readBitsImpl(m_context, numBits);
394 
395  return readBits64Impl(m_context, numBits);
396 #endif
397 }
398 
399 int64_t BitStreamReader::readSignedBits64(uint8_t numBits)
400 {
401  checkNumBits64(numBits);
402 
403 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
404  return readSignedBitsImpl(m_context, numBits);
405 #else
406  if (numBits <= 32)
407  return readSignedBitsImpl(m_context, numBits);
408 
409  int64_t value = static_cast<int64_t>(readBits64Impl(m_context, numBits));
410 
411  // Skip the signed overflow correction if numBits == 64.
412  // In that case, the value that comes out the readBits function
413  // is already correct.
414  const bool needsSignExtension =
415  numBits < 64 && (static_cast<uint64_t>(value) >= (UINT64_C(1) << (numBits - 1)));
416  if (needsSignExtension)
417  value -= UINT64_C(1) << numBits;
418 
419  return value;
420 #endif
421 }
422 
423 int32_t BitStreamReader::readSignedBits(uint8_t numBits)
424 {
425  checkNumBits(numBits);
426 
427  return static_cast<int32_t>(readSignedBitsImpl(m_context, numBits));
428 }
429 
430 int64_t BitStreamReader::readVarInt64()
431 {
432  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
433  const uint8_t sign = byte & VARINT_SIGN_1;
434  int64_t result = byte & VARINT_BYTE_1;
435  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_1))
436  return sign ? -result : result;
437 
438  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
439  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
440  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
441  return sign ? -result : result;
442 
443  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
444  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
445  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
446  return sign ? -result : result;
447 
448  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
449  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
450  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
451  return sign ? -result : result;
452 
453  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 5
454  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
455  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
456  return sign ? -result : result;
457 
458  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 6
459  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
460  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
461  return sign ? -result : result;
462 
463  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 7
464  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
465  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
466  return sign ? -result : result;
467 
468  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 8
469  return sign ? -result : result;
470 }
471 
472 int32_t BitStreamReader::readVarInt32()
473 {
474  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
475  const uint8_t sign = byte & VARINT_SIGN_1;
476  int32_t result = byte & VARINT_BYTE_1;
477  if ((byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_1) == 0)
478  return sign ? -result : result;
479 
480  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
481  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
482  if ((byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N) == 0)
483  return sign ? -result : result;
484 
485  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
486  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
487  if ((byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N) == 0)
488  return sign ? -result : result;
489 
490  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
491  return sign ? -result : result;
492 }
493 
494 int16_t BitStreamReader::readVarInt16()
495 {
496  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
497  const uint8_t sign = byte & VARINT_SIGN_1;
498  int16_t result = byte & VARINT_BYTE_1;
499  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_1))
500  return sign ? -result : result;
501 
502  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
503  return sign ? -result : result;
504 }
505 
506 uint64_t BitStreamReader::readVarUInt64()
507 {
508  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
509  uint64_t result = byte & VARUINT_BYTE;
510  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
511  return result;
512 
513  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
514  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
515  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
516  return result;
517 
518  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
519  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
520  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
521  return result;
522 
523  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
524  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
525  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
526  return result;
527 
528  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 5
529  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
530  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
531  return result;
532 
533  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 6
534  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
535  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
536  return result;
537 
538  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 7
539  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
540  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
541  return result;
542 
543  result = result << 8 | readBitsImpl(m_context, 8); // byte 8
544  return result;
545 }
546 
547 uint32_t BitStreamReader::readVarUInt32()
548 {
549  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
550  uint32_t result = byte & VARUINT_BYTE;
551  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
552  return result;
553 
554  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
555  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
556  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
557  return result;
558 
559  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
560  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
561  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
562  return result;
563 
564  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
565  return result;
566 }
567 
568 uint16_t BitStreamReader::readVarUInt16()
569 {
570  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
571  uint16_t result = byte & VARUINT_BYTE;
572  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
573  return result;
574 
575  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
576  return result;
577 }
578 
579 int64_t BitStreamReader::readVarInt()
580 {
581  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
582  const uint8_t sign = byte & VARINT_SIGN_1;
583  int64_t result = byte & VARINT_BYTE_1;
584  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_1))
585  return sign ? (result == 0 ? INT64_MIN : -result) : result;
586 
587  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
588  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
589  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
590  return sign ? -result : result;
591 
592  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
593  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
594  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
595  return sign ? -result : result;
596 
597  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
598  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
599  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
600  return sign ? -result : result;
601 
602  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 5
603  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
604  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
605  return sign ? -result : result;
606 
607  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 6
608  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
609  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
610  return sign ? -result : result;
611 
612  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 7
613  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
614  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
615  return sign ? -result : result;
616 
617  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 8
618  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARINT_BYTE_N);
619  if (!(byte & VARINT_HAS_NEXT_N))
620  return sign ? -result : result;
621 
622  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 9
623  return sign ? -result : result;
624 }
625 
626 uint64_t BitStreamReader::readVarUInt()
627 {
628  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
629  uint64_t result = byte & VARUINT_BYTE;
630  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
631  return result;
632 
633  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
634  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
635  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
636  return result;
637 
638  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
639  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
640  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
641  return result;
642 
643  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
644  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
645  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
646  return result;
647 
648  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 5
649  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
650  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
651  return result;
652 
653  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 6
654  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
655  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
656  return result;
657 
658  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 7
659  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
660  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
661  return result;
662 
663  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 8
664  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
665  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
666  return result;
667 
668  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 9
669  return result;
670 }
671 
672 uint32_t BitStreamReader::readVarSize()
673 {
674  uint8_t byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 1
675  uint32_t result = byte & VARUINT_BYTE;
676  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
677  return result;
678 
679  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 2
680  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
681  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
682  return result;
683 
684  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 3
685  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
686  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
687  return result;
688 
689  byte = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 4
690  result = result << 7 | (byte & VARUINT_BYTE);
691  if (!(byte & VARUINT_HAS_NEXT))
692  return result;
693 
694  result = result << 8 | static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)); // byte 5
695  if (result > VARSIZE_MAX_VALUE)
696  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: Read value '" + convertToString(result) +
697  "' is out of range for varsize type!");
698 
699  return result;
700 }
701 
702 float BitStreamReader::readFloat16()
703 {
704  const uint16_t halfPrecisionFloatValue = static_cast<uint16_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 16));
705 
706  return convertUInt16ToFloat(halfPrecisionFloatValue);
707 }
708 
709 float BitStreamReader::readFloat32()
710 {
711  const uint32_t singlePrecisionFloatValue = static_cast<uint32_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 32));
712 
713  return convertUInt32ToFloat(singlePrecisionFloatValue);
714 }
715 
716 double BitStreamReader::readFloat64()
717 {
718 #ifdef ZSERIO_RUNTIME_64BIT
719  const uint64_t doublePrecisionFloatValue = static_cast<uint64_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 64));
720 #else
721  const uint64_t doublePrecisionFloatValue = readBits64Impl(m_context, 64);
722 #endif
723 
724  return convertUInt64ToDouble(doublePrecisionFloatValue);
725 }
726 
727 std::string BitStreamReader::readString()
728 {
729  std::string value;
730  const size_t len = static_cast<size_t>(readVarSize());
731  value.reserve(len);
732  for (size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i)
733  {
734  value.push_back(static_cast<uint8_t>(readBitsImpl(m_context, 8)));
735  }
736  return value;
737 }
738 
739 bool BitStreamReader::readBool()
740 {
741  return readBitsImpl(m_context, 1) != 0;
742 }
743 
744 BitBuffer BitStreamReader::readBitBuffer()
745 {
746  const size_t bitSize = static_cast<size_t>(readVarSize());
747  size_t numBytesToRead = bitSize / 8;
748  const uint8_t numRestBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(bitSize - numBytesToRead * 8);
749  BitBuffer bitBuffer(bitSize);
750  uint8_t* buffer = bitBuffer.getBuffer();
751  const BitPosType beginBitPosition = getBitPosition();
752  if ((beginBitPosition & 0x07) != 0)
753  {
754  // we are not aligned to byte
755  while (numBytesToRead > 0)
756  {
757  *buffer = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBits(8));
758  buffer++;
759  numBytesToRead--;
760  }
761  }
762  else
763  {
764  // we are aligned to byte
765  setBitPosition(beginBitPosition + numBytesToRead * 8);
766  memcpy(buffer, m_context.buffer + beginBitPosition / 8, numBytesToRead);
767  buffer += numBytesToRead;
768  }
769 
770  if (numRestBits > 0)
771  *buffer = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBits(numRestBits) << (8 - numRestBits));
772 
773  return bitBuffer;
774 }
775 
776 void BitStreamReader::setBitPosition(BitPosType position)
777 {
778  if (position > m_context.bufferBitSize)
779  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamReader: Reached eof(), setting of bit position failed.");
780 
781  m_context.bitIndex = (position / 8) * 8; // set to byte aligned position
782  m_context.cacheNumBits = 0; // invalidate cache
783  const uint8_t skip = static_cast<uint8_t>(position - m_context.bitIndex);
784  if (skip != 0)
785  readBits(skip);
786 }
787 
788 void BitStreamReader::alignTo(size_t alignment)
789 {
790  const BitPosType offset = getBitPosition() % alignment;
791  if (offset != 0)
792  {
793  const uint8_t skip = static_cast<uint8_t>(alignment - offset);
794  readBits64(skip);
795  }
796 }
